mapper.delete: delete from cart where PROD_NO=#{cartProd.prodNo} and user_id=#{cartUserId} and cart_code='1'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT c.cart_no, c.prod_no, c.user_id, c.cart_amount, c.cart_code, p.price, p.prod_name, p.prod_amount from cart c, product p where c.user_id=#{userCartId} and c.prod_no=p.prod_no order by c.cart_no) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
